sentences.en: ...a video recording of a police interview.
a scratchy recording of Mario Lanza
sentences.cn: 一盘有杂音的马里奥∙兰扎演唱录音带

sentences.en: a tape recording of the interview
a video recording of the wedding
Cale has ploughed a more esoteric furrow as a recording artist.
sentences.cn: 作为一名录音艺人，凯尔走了一条较为冷僻的道路。

sentences.en: Have you heard their latest recording?
sentences.cn: 你可曾听他们最近的唱片?

sentences.en: He works as a sound technician in a recording studio.
sentences.cn: 他在录音室做音效技师.

sentences.en: In a new recording, the Boston Philharmonic tried the original tempo.
sentences.cn: 在新唱片中，波士顿爱乐乐团尝试了全新的节奏。

sentences.en: Listening to the scratchy recording, I recognized Walt Whitman immediately.
sentences.cn: 听到沙哑的录音，我立刻知道那是沃尔特·惠特曼。

sentences.en: Set the counter to zero and you'll know where the recording starts.
sentences.cn: 把计数器拨到零,你就会知道录音从哪儿开始.

sentences.en: She'smuch happier performing live than in a recording studio.
sentences.cn: 与在录音棚里录音相比，她更喜欢现场表演。

sentences.en: The 30-year-old star is trying to free himself from his recording contract.
sentences.cn: 这位30岁的明星正试图从他的唱片合约中脱身。

sentences.en: The quality of reproduction isn't very good on this recording.
sentences.cn: 这录音的复制质量不太好.

sentences.en: The recording can be erased and the tape used again.
sentences.cn: 录音可以抹去,磁带可以再用.

sentences.en: This was also the beginning of her recording career.
sentences.cn: 这也是她唱片生涯的开始。

sentences.en: We have viewed the video recording of the incident.
sentences.cn: 我们看过了该事件的录像。

words.tran_cn: 档案，履历；唱片；最高纪录
录音机；记录器；记录员；八孔直笛

phrases.tran_cn: 记录仪器，录音机；自记装置

trans.tran_cn: 记录，录音，唱片，录了音的磁带，录音的节目
trans.tran_en: the act of storing sound or images on tape or  disc s

trans.tran_cn: 记录，录音，拍摄( record的现在分词)，显示，自动记下，标明，发表正式（或法律方面的）声明
